response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
